name: She Wants Me Dead
description: Max is in trouble. He pissed off his cat Lula and now she’s out to get him. And Lula is far from sweet. She is vicious, cold and unforgiving. More dangerous than Lula are her traps – deadly and brutal killing contraptions with Max’s name written all over them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows 7/Vista/XP Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9c compatible video card with minimum 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Max is terrible at parkour; he take almost 1 second to jump when you tell him to. That make sense because he's an ordinary human, am I right?  Good luck have fun with the game.
